targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -90d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Processor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "CpuProcessorUtility" )
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        _measurement: r._measurement,
        Status: if exists r._value and (uint(v: now()) - uint(v: r._time)) < 60000000000 then "Live" else "Offline"
    }))
  |> yield(name: "uptime_on_off")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Processor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SystemUpTime")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Voltage")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Processor" or r["Metrics_type"] == "Disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ProcessorQueueLength" or r["_field"] == "CurrentDiskQueueLength")
  |> drop(columns: ["Metrics_type","Device_id"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Memory" or r["Metrics_type"] == "Processor" or r["Metrics_type"] == "Disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "CpuProcessorUtility" or r["_field"] == "MemoryUsagePercentage" or r["_field"] == "DiskSpaceUsagePercentage")
  |> drop(columns: ["Metrics_type","Device_id"])
  |> last()
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Device_id", "CpuProcessorUtility", "MemoryUsagePercentage", "DiskSpaceUsagePercentage"])
  |> rename(columns: {
      "_time": "Time",
      "CpuProcessorUtility": "CPU Usage (%)",
      "DiskSpaceUsagePercentage": "Disk Usage (%)",
      "MemoryUsagePercentage": "Memory Usage (%)"
  })

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -10d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "SystemInfo")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "CSName", "Model", "Manufacturer",  
                    "BiosName", "ProcessorName", "ProcessorCores", "TotalDiskSizeGB","ProcessorLogicalProcessors", "OSArchitecture", "OSInstallDate", "OSName", 
                    "TotalMemoryGB", "PowerPlanName", "ProcessorMaxClockSpeed"])
    |> rename(columns: {
      Model: "Model Name",
      Manufacturer: "Manufacturer",
      TotalDiskSizeGB: "Disk Size (GB)",
      CSName: "Device Name",
      BiosName: "BIOS Version",
      ProcessorName: "Processor",
      ProcessorMaxClockSpeed: "Processor Max Speed",
      ProcessorCores: "Processor Cores (Physical)",
      ProcessorLogicalProcessors: "Processor Cores (Virtual)",
      OSArchitecture: "System Architecture",
      OSInstallDate: "OS Installation Date",
      OSName: "Operating System",
      TotalMemoryGB: "RAM Size (GB)",
      PowerPlanName: "Power Plan"
  })

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Processor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Threads")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["Metrics_type","Device_id"])
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Processor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Processes")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["Metrics_type","Device_id"])
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Memory" or r["Metrics_type"] == "Processor" or r["Metrics_type"] == "Disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "CpuProcessorUtility" or r["_field"] == "MemoryUsagePercentage")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Device_id", "CpuProcessorUtility", "MemoryUsagePercentage"])
  |> rename(columns: {
      "_time": "Time",
      "CpuProcessorUtility": "CPU Usage (%)",
      "MemoryUsagePercentage": "Memory Usage (%)"
  })

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Processor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ContextSwitchesPerSec" )
  |> drop(columns: ["Metrics_type","Device_id"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Memory")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "MemoryUsagePercentage")

  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        _measurement: r._measurement,
        _field: r._field,
        _value: if exists r._value then 0 else 1
    }))
  |> yield(name: "uptime_on_off")

from(bucket: "NewDSS") 
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r["EventSource"] == "Application Error" or
    r["EventSource"] == "Application Hang" or
    r["EventSource"] == "Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-Power" or
    r["EventSource"] == "Bugcheck"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "TimeGenerated")
  |> group(columns: ["EventSource"])
  |> count()
  |> keep(columns: ["EventSource", "_value"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r["EventSource"] == "Application Error" or
    r["EventSource"] == "Application Hang" or
    r["EventSource"] == "Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-Power" or
    r["EventSource"] == "Bugcheck"
  )
  // grab only relevant fields
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "TimeGenerated" or r["_field"] == "ApplicationName")
  // pivot to get both fields on the same row
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  // now ApplicationName is in a real column!
  |> group(columns: ["ApplicationName"])
  |> count(column: "TimeGenerated")
  |> rename(columns: { TimeGenerated: "" })
  |> keep(columns: ["ApplicationName", ""])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r["EventSource"] == "Application Error" or
    r["EventSource"] == "Application Hang" or
    r["EventSource"] == "Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-Power" or
    r["EventSource"] == "Bugcheck"
  )
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r["Message"] and exists r["EventID"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Processor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "ProcessorTime" or r["_field"] == "CpuUserModeTime" or r["_field"] == "CpuKernelModeTime")
  |> drop(columns: ["Metrics_type","Device_id"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Processor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "CpuProcessorUtility")
  |> drop(columns: ["Metrics_type","Device_id"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Memory")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "MemoryUsagePercentage")
  |> drop(columns: ["Metrics_type","Device_id"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Memory")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PhysicalUsedGB" or r["_field"] == "PhysicalFreeGB")
  |> drop(columns: ["Metrics_type","Device_id"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "DiskSpaceUsagePercentage")
  |> drop(columns: ["Metrics_type","Device_id"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "AvgDiskQueueLength")
  |> drop(columns: ["Metrics_type","Device_id"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Processor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ProcessorQueueLength" )
  |> drop(columns: ["Metrics_type","Device_id"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Processor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "Threads")
  |> drop(columns: ["Metrics_type","Device_id"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DevicePerformance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Device_id"] == "${Device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Metrics_type"] == "Processor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "Processes")
  |> drop(columns: ["Metrics_type","Device_id"])
